prompt.text: Hi! I'm OPE_Bot.|||Tell the team your name and share something about yourself, such as a hobby you have or a game you like to play. Ask questions about what the others share. Take a few moments to learn more about each other.
Hi, [NAME].
Nice to meet you, [NAME].
Howdy, [NAME].
Hello, [NAME].
Whazup, [NAME]?
Welcome! We'll start soon.
We're starting!
Start by reading the introduction on the left.|||Type "ready" when you're ready to move on. We'll move on in a few minutes or when everyone is ready.
In this activity, your entire team is responsible for each response but you will take turns doing the write-up. ***Only one person at a time may do the editing.***
I'll give you time to write up each response. If you're done early, we'll move on after the entire team has entered "ready" in this chat window.
Here we go. I've displayed your first scenario on the left. (You'll need to scroll down as we go along.) I'll give you a little time to look at it.
Okay, your first prompt is displayed on the left.|||Remember to type "ready" when you're ready to move on.
A hint is displayed on left.|||Remember to type "ready" when you're ready to move on.
Your first question for this scenario is displayed on the left.
A hint is displayed on left.
Another question is displayed on the left.
Another question is displayed on the left.
The last question for this scenario is displayed on the left.
Another prompt on the left.
A hint is displayed on left.
Okay, now I've displayed a prompt about workload and performance metrics.
I've displayed my hint for workload and performance metrics for this scenario. Take a look and revise your response in the cell above appropriate.
Cost is always important. I've displayed a prompt about balancing cost and performance on the left.
I've displayed my hint for balancing cost and performance in this scenario. Take a look and revise your response in the cell above appropriate.
Okay! I've displayed a new scenario on the left. I'll give you some time to look at it.
I've displayed a prompt about autoscaling for this scenario.
I've displayed my hint to an autoscaling policy for this scenario. Take a look and revise your response in the cell above appropriate.
I've displayed a prompt about how aggressively to scale.
I've displayed my hint for how aggressively to scale in this scenario. Take a look and revise your response in the cell above appropriate.
A prompt about workload and performance metrics is now displayed.
I've displayed my hint for workload and performance metrics for this scenario. Take a look and revise your response in the cell above appropriate.
Now I've displayed a prompt about balancing cost and performance.
I've displayed my hint for balancing cost and performance in this scenario. Take a look and revise your response in the cell above appropriate.
Alright! The last scenario is now displayed on the left. I'll give you a little time to look at it.
A prompt about autoscaling for this scenario is now displayed.
I've displayed my hint to an autoscaling policy for this scenario. Take a look and revise your response in the cell above appropriate.
Now a prompt about how aggressively to scale is displayed.
I've displayed my hint for how aggressively to scale in this scenario. Take a look at and revise your response in the cell above appropriate.
I've displayed a prompt about workload and performance metrics.
My hint to workload and performance metrics for this scenario is now displayed. Take a look at and revise your response in the cell above appropriate.
A prompt about balancing cost and performance for this scenario is displayed on the left.
Last prompt! I've displayed my hint for balancing cost and performance in this scenario. Take a look and revise your response in the cell above appropriate.
*** Finally, ONE TEAM MEMBER should execute the submit cell to submit your work. *** You'll be done after you've submitted.|||Thanks for participating in this activity!
That's all! Thanks for participating in this activity.
It's time for me to logoff. Bye!
[NAME1], you're in charge of writing up the first response. Remember that the entire team is responsible -- [NAME1] is just doing the write-up.|||Use this chat window to discuss as a team.
